____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQS:<code>?((side _unit) == [[civilian]]) : [[hint]] "This is a civilian unit!"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> SQF:<code>[[if]] (([[side]] _unit) == [[civilian]]) [[then]] {

};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

<dt class="note">[[User:KC Grimes|KC Grimes]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In '''Arma 3 v1.82''', units where [[setCaptive]] and/or [[setUnconscious]] are set to true are on side civilian, regardless of low rating (Renegade status).
